name: stackmart
description: Stackmart - A full-featured eCommerce web application.

scripts.db:check: node -e "const mongoose = require('mongoose'); mongoose.connect(process.env.MONGODB_URI || 'mongodb://localhost:27017/stackmart').then(() => { console.log('MongoDB connection successful'); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { console.error('MongoDB connection failed:', err); process.exit(1); });"
scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend

author: Ajay Boro
